attributes.action: Chase motorbike thieves and stop them
attributes.additional_details:
Police have no powers to chase a known suspect on a potentially stolen motor bike - why ? In case the rider hurts themselves.  In the meantime these thieving  scumbags get to make a mockery of our judicial system, our Police and our law abiding citizens who save hard and pay legally for their two wheels.

Therefore I ask the Attorney General to adopt a zero tolerance to this ever increasing crime and allow our Police to do whatever is necessary to remove these dangerous criminals from our streets.
